original_text: Whoever wants to keep his own life safe will lose it. But whoever gives his life to serve me will have true life.
korean_text: 무릇 자기 목숨을 보전하고자 하는 자는 잃을 것이요 잃는 자는 살리리라

sentences.original_text: Whoever wants to keep his own life safe
But whoever gives his life to serve me
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 나를 섬기기 위해 자기 생명을 내어놓는 사람은
